title: The White Shadow S01E03 The Offer DVDRip DivX
description:
The White Shadow Season 1 (1978)
S01E03 The Offer
First aired: 12/4/1978 
A beautiful young TV reporter is in town to do a special on Coach Reeves at Carver High and tries to lure him into quitting and going into broadcasting.
Cast: Ken Howard(Ken Reeves), Nathan Cook(Milton Reese), Thomas Carter(James Hayward), Eric Kilpatrick(Curtis Jackson), Timothy Van Patten(Mario Pettrino(Salami)), Ken Michelman(Abner Goldstein), Robin Pearson Rose(Katie Donahue), Ed Bernard(Jim Willis), Joan Pringle(Sybil Buchanan), Jason Bernard(Jim Willis), Jerry Fogel(Bill Donahue), Kevin Hooks(Morris Thorpe), Byron Stewart(Warren Coolidge), Ira Angustain(Ricky Gomez) 
Guest star: Fawne Harriman (Sally Adams), Rosanna DeSoto (Mrs. Haber (Spanish teacher)), Lupe Ontiveros (Mrs. Gomez), Alan Rachins (Network boss)
Writer: Marc Rubin 
Director: Bruce Paltrow
